TextLibrary.Text: Do we have time for a side trip?
Do we have time for a side trip?
I was reading through some old logs and came across something interesting. You've heard of The Lost?
I was reading through some old logs and came across something interesting. You've heard of The Lost?
The rogue telepaths who turned traitor and fled the Academy on Serpens Prime. That was years ago.
The rogue telepaths who turned traitor and fled the Academy on Serpens Prime. That was years ago.
Exactly. The log said they fled to Atlia, but then couldn't be found. Atlia is a dead end system. They must have had some means of escaping undetected. I'm curious to look around there.
Exactly. The log said they fled to Atlia, but then couldn't be found. Atlia is a dead end system. They must have had some means of escaping undetected. I'm curious to look around there.
